item.title: Windows Server 2008 R2, SQL Server Express 2008 R2, and LINQPad
item.description: Quick steps on getting SQL Server Express 2008 R2 configured on Windows Server 2008 R2 (using Web Platform Installer for installation) so that we can use LINQPad to query it on another server.

item.title: Determine BlogEngine.NET comments that haven't been published - with LINQPad
item.description: Find all BlogEngine.NET posts with unapproved comments using this code and LINQPad.
